text: Troy D. Edgar (born 1966/1967) is an American politician and businessman who has been the 9th United States Deputy Secretary of Homeland Security since 2025. He was the Mayor of Los Alamitos, California three times from 2009 to 2010, 2012 to 2014 and from 2018 to 2019. In March 2019, Edgar was nominated as Chief Financial Officer of the United States Department of Homeland Security. In December 2024, Edgar was nominated by President-elect Donald Trump to be the United States deputy secretary of homeland security. ==References== Category:Living people Category:1960s births Category:American mayors Category:Politicians from California Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:People from Orange County, California
title: Troy Edgar
